purpose: To serve as an extensive resource for discovering and exploring open-source projects.
principle: Collects and organizes open-source projects into a structured and easily navigable list.
reusability: Can be used as a reference for finding open-source projects, suitable for developers looking for resources or contributors seeking projects.
limitations: Primarily a static list, does not include dynamic features like project updates or real-time collaboration tools.
name: definitive-opensource
description: The definitive list of open source.
highlight: A comprehensive and curated list of open-source projects across various domains.
